AL Command Syntax

AL commands are functions or procedures. Various groups of commands perform the same operation but differ in how arguments are supplied to them. To conveniently accomodate this variation, we adopt the OpenGL nnotation for describing commands and their arguments.

Annotation (Not all types supported yet)
 

At this time AL does not support the full flexibility that OpenGL offers. Certain entry points are supported only for some data types. In general, AL tends to use less entry points, using setter commands that use the same tokens as the matching query commands.
